segments.text: I'm looking over at the children, and they're up to no good, that's for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a young boy climbing on a two-step stool, which looks incredibly wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching to reach into the "COOKIE JAR" in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His small hand is already inside, grabbing away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him has her arm raised, palm open, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together, a little team of secret cookie thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s pretty clever how they’ve positioned themselves, out of the woman’s direct line of sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself smiling at their mischievous little plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so focused on their sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper playing out right here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet those cookies are going to taste extra good because they're forbidden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope that stool doesn't completely give out on them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene just makes me feel a bit nostalgic for my own childhood antics.
segments.speaker: PAR
